page.title: 02An Interview with P.C. Brake
page.content: On May 1st we interviewed one of our local policemen.He said "In Twyford last year about 426 crimes were committed and this year 140.In our area the most frequent crime is car stealing and the least frequent is rape.The most dangerous crime you could deal with is when your life is at risk,but the only thing that has happened to me is being trapped between two cars.You can also have very embarrassing moments.Mine was when I first started and everyone stared at me.Even though I have not dealt with any murders I have seen a lot of corpses.When I was a boy my ambition was to become a policeman because on the walls were posters saying"Join the police force".On a typical day we first go to the office, book up on a shift, lock up the station and set off on our duties."
